name: Grivel Tech Leash
description: Excellent for all of Grivel® ice axes, from the classical to the most technical, including the Nepal, Monster, and Matrix.Ring attaches to the axe headEasy toggle system lets you hook up and release with a single, simple hand movement.Natural rubber sling gives comfortable support to the wrist and the climber's weight. Wrist sizes and length are easily adjustable with just one strap.
